Fire Emblem Warriors: Three Hopes was featured in Famitsu this week with the latest details. A good amount was previously known, but new information was included as well.

articles.author: Nelson Aguilar
articles.title: Take Android Screenshots With a Simple Swipe or No Buttons at All - CNET
articles.description: For anyone who's rebooted an Android phone while trying to capture a screenshot, there are easier ways to do it.
articles.content:
Voice commands and swipe gestures can make taking screenshots easier.
John Kim/CNET
